alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 9:59AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of central Miami-Dade County through 1030 AM EST... At 959 AM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a gusty shower over Palmetto Bay, or near Kendall, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Coral Gables, Kendall, Pinecrest, Richmond Heights, Palmetto Bay, Cutler Bay, Zoo Miami, West Perrine, Goulds, The Crossings, South Miami Heights, The Falls, Howard, Palmetto Estates and Three Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
